fn.p: Citation Prasad R, Mohanakumari VV, Sasi RV, Nair R, Jones S, Pillai MR. 2020. Complete genome analysis of influenza A(H1N1) viruses isolated in Kerala, India. Microbiol Resour Announc 9:e00062-20. https://doi.org/10.1128/MRA.00062-20.
